text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump So you just said you’ve been taking #Hydrochloroquine for two weeks. Is that because you’ve contracted #Covid19 or are you taking a dangerous drug for no valid reason ? #Moronavirus or #25thAmendment ? Pick one.
